availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Goldman H. Goodman (Anderson County, KY, physician)

body.p: Anderson County, Kentucky, physician. Kentucky native. Married to Lucinda Wright Goodman in Madison County, Kentucky, on December 21, 1839. Father of Samuel Goodman and Susan Goodman. Carpenter in Mercer County, Kentucky, in 1850. Physician in Anderson County in 1860. United States postmaster in Anderson County from March 14, 1860, to November 1, 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 1, p. 255B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, p. 442.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Madison County Marriages, Film 000183302, p. 220.
Record of Appointment of Postmasters, 1832-1971, Records of the Post Office Department, NARA Series M841, RG 28, Anderson County, Kentucky, vol. 28.
"Dr Goldman H Goodman (1818-1882)," Find A Grave, Memorial 99948031, accessed January 25, 2024, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/99948031.
